attributes.action: Set up commission to consider whole of NHS & social care:Funds,staff,targets etc
attributes.additional_details:
Kings Fund: www.kingsfund.org.uk

Tackling the growing crisis in the NHS
7 Apr 2016
Chris Ham, Helen McKenna, Phoebe Dunn
Drawing on our previous work and a lecture given by Chris Ham to the Cambridge Whitehall Group, we offer some practical solutions to help the NHS address one of the biggest crises in its history.
attributes.background:
The NHS is in melt down
Social care bursting
How is this sorted? 
Funding inadequate; staffing in crisis; targets distorting clinical priorities; safety poor(10% of patients suffer harm); stop closures; revise A&E/111/GP OOH care; stop reorganising/waste £; make managers/politico's accountable

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. We're not sure what kind of a Commission you want. There are several different kinds of Commission, including parliamentary commissions and royal commissions. You could start a petition to establish a specific kind of Commission to consider the future of the NHS and social care.
